fuel_system: Injection. Integrated engine management system. Electronic fuel injection with ride-by-wire electronic throttle control.
frame: Modular tubular steel frame fastened to aluminium side plates by high strength bolts. Removable rear subframe.
front_suspension: Kayaba upside-down fork, Ø 41 mm stanchions adjustable in preload and hydraulic rebound damping
rear_suspension: Aluminium alloy swingarm Sachs monoshock absorber adjustable in preload and hydraulic rebound damping.
front_brakes: Double disc. ABS.Stainless steel wave floating wave disc. 4-piston.
rear_brakes: Single disc. ABS. Four-piston radial calipers..
seat_height: 870 mm (34.3 inches) If adjustable, lowest setting.
ignition: Digital electronic, integrated in the fuel injection system.

clutch: Multiplate wet clutch with mechanical slipper system.
frame: Aluminium dual beam chassis with cast and pressed sheet elements. (Sachs steering damper on APRC version)

rear_suspension: Sachs fully adjustable single shock absorber

rear_brakes: Single disc. ABS. Brembo floating calliper.
seat_height: 87 mm (3.4 inches) If adjustable, lowest setting.
ignition: Magneti Marelli digital electronic ignition system integrated in engine control system, with one spark plug per cylinder and “stick-coil” type coils
